text: The manipulation of digitised information by computer or other digital electronic equipment is known as
Which of the following statements explains information processing

options.B: Changing information detectable by an observer

explanation: Information processing is the manipulation of data to produce useful information.  Processing information involves taking raw information and making it more useful by putting it into context. Hence OPTION B is correct.

text: By default numeric values in a worksheet are
The diagram in Figure 5 depicts a
explanation:
The figure above depicts a network database model.
A network database is a model wherein multiple member records or files can be linked to multiple owner files and vice versa. The model can be viewed as an upside-down tree where each member's information is the branch linked to the owner, which is the bottom of the tree.

text: Which of the following sets are available when creating a table in "Design view" in Microsoft Access?

options.A: Data type, Description and Field Name

explanation: field name, data type, and description are available when creating a table in "Design view" in Microsoft Access

text: The MS PowerPoint feature which can be used to change the appearance of the entire presentation is the
explanation: The Design template option is the MS PowerPoint feature that can be used to change the appearance of the entire presentation. This feature allows you to select a pre-designed template or create your custom template that can be applied to all slides in your presentation.

text: One example of web design package is
explanation: Microsoft FrontPage: It is a web tool that allows users to create custom websites without knowing HTML code. It helps you manage the pages on your web and create and edit web pages in a What-You-See-Is-What-You-Get (WYSIWYG) fashion while MS Outlook, Peachtree(an accounting software), and SPSS (It is a suite of software programs that analyze scientific data related to the social sciences) are not.

text: In computer maintenance the dampen material can be used on the following devices except
Dust from the system unit casing can be removed using
Indiscriminate sending of unsolicited e-mails to many addresses is known as
In computing, ergonomics is a term associated with computer
A novice is discouraged from opening the CRT monitor for maintenance because

options.A: it cannot be appropriately reassembled after opening
options.B: it may harbour pests carrying infectious diseases

explanation: CRT stands for Cathode Ray Tube. CRT is a technology used in traditional computer monitors and televisions. CRTs are glass vessels that have the air pumped out of them. They have very thick glass in the screen area and thinner glass in the narrow neck area. This makes a CRT fairly fragile when it is not encased in a computer. The neck area is particularly easy to break or crack.

text: Computer professional bodies in Nigeria include the following except
explanation: COMPUTER PROFESSIONAL BODIES IN NIGERIA: There are regulatory measures that are important in any field of endeavor to maintain professional and ethical standards these bodies oversee the compliance to set rules and regulations. They are: 1. Nigeria Computer Society (NCS) was established in 1978 2. Computer Professional Registration Council of Nigeria (CPRN) was established1993. Institute of Management Information (IMI) 4. Information Technology Association of Nigeria (ITAN) was established1991. 5. Nigeria Internet Group (NIG) 6. Nigeria Software Group (NSG) 7. Internet service providers association of Nigeria, etc.

text: The malware which appears as a harmless object but attack it's victims at the slightest opportunity is called
explanation: ATrojan Horse (malware) is a type of malware that disguises itself as legitimate code or software. Once inside the network, attackers can carry out any action that a legitimate user could perform, such as exporting files, modifying data, deleting files or otherwise altering the contents of the device.

options.D: using external disk on public computer system

text: The parts of the object in Figure 7above labeled II are called
explanation:
The part labeled in the diagram above is called Attribute.
Attribute:An attribute is a characteristic of an entity type. Some attributes of common entity types include the following:
STUDENT = {Student ID, Name, Address, Phone, Email, DOB}
ACCOUNT = {Account Number, Account Type, Date Opened, Balance} etc.

text: The arrangement that gives the correct order of magnitude of the database elements is

options.A: character, field, record, table, database, file
options.B: character, field, record, table, file, database
options.C: database, table, file, record, field, character
options.D: database, record, file, field, table, character

text: One unique feature of index file is that it contains
Which of the following file organization requires a primary key
explanation: An indexed file is a file in which each record includes a primary key. To distinguish one record from another, the primary key's value must be unique for each record. Records can then be accessed randomly by specifying the value of the record's primary key.

text: Ensuring the correctness and consistency of data is referred to as data
explanation: Data integrity refers to the accuracy, consistency, and completeness of data throughout its lifecycle. By following the process, organizations not only ensure the integrity of the data but also guarantee they have accurate and correct data in their database. The importance of data integrity increases as data volumes continue to increase exponentially.
